title: The first thing I thought when I saw the new Dark Star Black Hole map.
body:
1. Toss out Lantern.
2. When teammate takes, Flash into black hole.

replies.body: I like the way you think...
Inb4 he gets suspended for making players have a ''Negative'' experience.
I mean I'd say it's quite an _attractive_ experience.

Haha yes, Hey Kayo, Check this rework idea by Mira, I think you would personally love it as you've always thought Yasuo scaling speed was a problem along with Wind wall but everything else was fine, I want your opinion too if you don't mind! 

Here's the link for the thread Mira just made: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/H6nGwafH-yasuo-post-wall-of-text-inc?comment=0005
Why don't you just PM him?
This whole game originated in Starcraft...

As far as I know it was a map in Starcraft, infamously known among the League players as Defence of the Ancients - or shortly DotA. Ryze and Tryndamere (founders of Riot, not champions) made the game League of Legends inspired by that gamemode and some time after DotA 2 was released, so the question of what was first is the same as the chicken/egg question.
DotA was in Warcraft, but DotA was based on Aeon of Strife which was made in Starcraft.
So DotA 2 is based on the original DotA, which is based in Warcraft, which is based off of Starcraft? That's sounds like the most complicated labor of love I ever heard of.
was a custom mode for warcraft not starcraft.
DotA was inspired by a specific level in StarCraft but it was made in WarCraft 3
{{champion:223}}  is the answer. Puke people into the black hole, of any team you feel like.

I'd totally buy Dark Star Tahm Kench.

...Well, if the champion was a bit better. And could be played jungle.
So the black hole pulls someone into another black hole? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

this is what i have been waiting for.
- Mastery 6 thresh
